message: Let's make a deal! I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  It's a good offer for you to accept now since the value decreases with each round.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think a 55/45 split is fairer considering the inflation rate will favor you more in future rounds.  Let's end this now.
Bob, I appreciate the compromise, but the inflation is working against me.  I'm proposing a 56/44 split. It's a better deal than you'll get in later rounds.
